name: Joseph
text: What is this smell?

name: Joseph
text: It is so stink!

name: Joseph
text: You alright kid?

name: Student
text: I'm alright, but I don't think this place is where everyone is at.

name: Joseph
text: We should investigate, follow me!

name: Joseph
text: Kid! be careful!
something approached between student and Joseph.
Joseph push student away with full force

name: Student
text: What is that!

name: Student
text: Mr. Joseph! are you ok?
Joseph lied on the ground while holding his stomach.

name: Joseph
text: I told you to be careful right, huh?
There is an dark aura cover over his body

name: Joseph
text: Leave!

name: Joseph
text: I don't think I can hold this!

name: Joseph
text: Arghhhh!!!!
Joseph screaming with pain and suddenly turn his voice down with silent.

name: Joseph
text: Hoh...
The voice deeper that his own student ever heard.

name: Joseph
text: Finally... I can...

name: Joseph
text: I can move freely!

name: Joseph
text: Let's conquer this world! my comrades!
There's a lot of trash coming from behind his back and get out through the door.

name: Student
text: Wh.. who are you!?

name: Student
text: And what about Mr. Joseph?

name: Joseph
text: Hmm... It seem I found a lost one here...

name: Joseph
text: I... My name is Diabolos, the devil of dirtiness.

name: Diabolos
text: But first, I have to say thank you for this body...

name: Diabolos
text: Heh... Hehe heh

name: Diabolos
text: I will fulfill this world with the trash!!

name: Student
text: I won't let you do that!

name: Student
text: I will defeat you and bring back Mr. Joseph!
